description: This PHP source file implements a web interface for managing Dynamic DNS (DDNS) settings on a network device. It includes HTML markup, embedded PHP for server-side logic and data fetching, and JavaScript/jQuery for client-side interactivity. The file provides UI for enabling/disabling DDNS, listing existing DDNS services, and allowing users to add, edit, or delete DDNS service configurations.

methods.name: add_service
methods.description: Client-side JavaScript function to add a new DDNS service rule, checking for maximum allowed rules and redirecting to the add page.

methods.name: $.radioswitch
methods.description: Custom jQuery plugin used to create toggle switch UI components for enabling/disabling DDNS.

methods.name: setupDeleteConfirmDialogs
methods.description: Function to attach confirmation dialogs for delete actions on DDNS service entries.
